title: Bitcoin Price Hits $8.8K Only to Crash in a ‘Logistical Move’ — Trader
text:
Bitcoin Price Hits $8.8K Only to Crash in a ‘Logistical Move’ — Trader

Cryptocurrency News 2 hours ago (Oct 11, 2019 07:01AM ET)

© Reuters. Bitcoin Price Hits $8.8K Only to Crash in a ‘Logistical Move’ — Trader price (BTC) traded broadly lower on Oct. 11 after sudden volatility broke a sideways trend in place since earlier in the week. Data from Coin360 showed circling $8,350 on Friday, having jumped to a local high of above $8,770 earlier. Keep track of top crypto markets in real time hereContinue Reading on Coin Telegraph
